entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 7:07 PM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
